VideoTitle: Lisa Feigenbaum - Code Snippets in Visual Studio
Author: scobleizer
Description: Ken Levy takes his camcorder over to interview Lisa Feigenbaum and get a look at the new Code Snippets feature in Visual Studio.

VideoTitle: Mike Murray - What the guy who wrote shrimp and weenies memo is doing now
Author: scobleizer
Description: Can you live on $2 a day? More than half the world's population does.Mike Murray used to be Microsoft's vice president in charge of HR (before that he worked at Apple on the original Macintosh team).

VideoTitle: Meet the new Mobile PC Team (new Tablet PC features too!)
Author: scobleizer

VideoTitle: Windows Sideshow Team - Auxiliary Displays (new laptop feature coming next year)

VideoTitle: Gordon Bell - Tour of the Computer History Museum, Part II

VideoTitle: Gordon Bell - Tour of the Computer History Museum, Part I

Description:
Gordon Bell. The name is legendary among geeks. Just read 
his Wikipedia page to see his accomplishments.About 30 years ago he started collecting computers while working at DEC. That little hobby tur

VideoTitle: The new Outlook Express: Windows Mail demoed
Author: scobleizer
Description: As part of our journey around Windows Vista teams, we wondered what was being done to Outlook Express. Well, for Windows Vista it's been renamed to Windows Mail. And that's not all.

VideoTitle: Tomas Palmer and Tolga Acar - Crypto in Windows Vista
Author: scobleizer
Description: How do you keep your secret stuff secret? Cryptography. Tomas Palmer and Tolga Acar sit down with Joe Smith for an interesting interview.

Author: scobleizer
Description: Paul and Erik talk about what they presented this week at the PDC: Dynamic Programming in Visual Basic.

VideoTitle: Paul Vick and Amanda Silver - VB Language Futures
Author: scobleizer
Description: Here Paul and Amanda talk about the future of Visual Basic.

IE team and learn what they are doing to protect computer users against phishing and malware and other kin

what developers need to do to make a great Windows Vista application. Video length: 45:02.

Author: scobleizer
Description: Kam Vedbrat is a lead program manager on the AERO team which redesigned the User Interface of Windows Vista (the next version of Windows). We spend half an hour looking at the user interface.
